cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15 FATAL_ERROR)
include(FetchContent)

FetchContent_Declare(softfloat_srcs
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/ucb-bar/berkeley-softfloat-3.git
    GIT_TAG master
)
if(NOT softfloat_srcs_POPULATED)
    FetchContent_Populate(softfloat_srcs)
    file(COPY ${softfloat_srcs_SOURCE_DIR}/source/include/softfloat.h DESTINATION ${softfloat_srcs_SOURCE_DIR})
    file(RENAME ${softfloat_srcs_SOURCE_DIR}/softfloat.h ${softfloat_srcs_SOURCE_DIR}/softfloat_orig.h )
    FetchContent_GetProperties(softfloat_srcs)
endif()

set(EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION ${softfloat_srcs_SOURCE_DIR})

CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_INFORMATION(RESULT HOSTINFO QUERY
    OS_PLATFORM    #0
    IS_64BIT       #1
    HAS_SSE2       #2
)

LIST(GET HOSTINFO 0 HI_OS_PLATFORM)
LIST(GET HOSTINFO 1 HIF_64BIT)
LIST(GET HOSTINFO 2 HIF_SSE2)

IF(WIN32)
    IF(NOT ${HIF_64BIT})
        IF(${HIF_SSE2})
            SET(PLATFORM_N Win32-SSE2-MinGW)
        ELSE()
            SET(PLATFORM_N Win32-MinGW)
        ENDIF()
    ELSE()
        SET(PLATFORM_N Win64-MinGW-w64)
        FILE(READ ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/build/${PLATFORM_N}/platform.h PLATFORMSTR)
        STRING(REPLACE "#define SOFTFLOAT_INTRINSIC_INT128 1" "" PLATFORMSTR ${PLATFORMSTR})
        STRING(REPLACE "#define SOFTFLOAT_BUILTIN_CLZ 1" "" PLATFORMSTR ${PLATFORMSTR})
        FILE(WRITE ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/build/${PLATFORM_N}/platform.h ${PLATFORMSTR})
    ENDIF()
ELSE() #Unix/Linux assumed
    IF(NOT ${HI_OS_PLATFORM} STREQUAL "x86_64")
        MESSAGE(FATAL_ERROR "Linux-Host CPU platforms other than 'x86_64' not supported." )
    ENDIF()
    SET (PLATFORM_N Linux-${HI_OS_PLATFORM}-GCC)
ENDIF()

SET(SPECIALIZE RISCV CACHE STRING "SoftFloat specialize for RISC-V target (default)")

##################### SOFTFLOAT UTILITY PROJECT (berkeley softfloat) #####################

SET(INC source/include)

SET(SOFTFLOAT_OPTS
    SOFTFLOAT_ROUND_ODD
    INLINE_LEVEL=5
    SOFTFLOAT_FAST_DIV32TO16
    SOFTFLOAT_FAST_DIV64TO32
)

SET(SRCS_PRIMITIVES
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_eq128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_le128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_lt128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftLeft128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftRight128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftRightJam64.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftRightJam64Extra.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftRightJam128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shortShiftRightJam128Extra.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam32.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam64.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam64Extra.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam128Extra.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_shiftRightJam256M.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_countLeadingZeros8.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_countLeadingZeros16.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_countLeadingZeros32.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_countLeadingZeros64.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_add128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_add256M.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_sub128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_sub256M.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_mul64ByShifted32To128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_mul64To128.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_mul128By32.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_mul128To256M.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_approxRecip_1Ks.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_approxRecip32_1.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_approxRecipSqrt_1Ks.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_approxRecipSqrt32_1.c
)

SET(SRCS_SPECIALIZE
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/softfloat_raiseFlags.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_f16UIToCommonNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_commonNaNToF16UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_propagateNaNF16UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_f32UIToCommonNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_commonNaNToF32UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_propagateNaNF32UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_f64UIToCommonNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_commonNaNToF64UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_propagateNaNF64UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/extF80M_isSignalingNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_extF80UIToCommonNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_commonNaNToExtF80UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_propagateNaNExtF80UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/f128M_isSignalingNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_f128UIToCommonNaN.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_commonNaNToF128UI.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}/s_propagateNaNF128UI.c
)

SET(SRCS_OTHERS
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_roundToUI32.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_roundToUI64.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/s_roundToI32.c

    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_to_f16.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_to_f32.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_to_extF80M.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_to_f64.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_roundToInt.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_add.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_sub.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_mul.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_mulAdd.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_div.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_rem.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_sqrt.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_eq.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_le.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_lt.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_eq_signaling.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_le_quiet.c
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/f128M_lt_quiet.c
)

SET(BPROJECT_NAME berkeley-softfloat)

ADD_LIBRARY(${BPROJECT_NAME}
    ${SRCS_PRIMITIVES}
    ${SRCS_SPECIALIZE}
    ${SRCS_OTHERS}
)

IF(WIN32)
    SET(CMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS ON)
ELSE()
    TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS(${BPROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE -O3)
ENDIF()

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${BPROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/source/${SPECIALIZE}
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/${INC}
    ${EXTERNAL_INSTALL_LOCATION}/build/${PLATFORM_N}
)
TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS(${BPROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC
    SOFTFLOAT_FAST_INT64
    ${SOFTFLOAT_OPTS}
    INLINE=inline
)
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET ${BPROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
